issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: Deprecate and replace `pyarrow.Field.add_metadata` (and other likely named methods) with replace_metadata, set_metadata or with_metadata. Knowing Spark's immutable API, I would have chosen with_metadata but I guess this is probably not what the average Python user would expect as naming.
